root.name: Monopoly Millionaire
root.description: OverviewMonopoly Millionaire is a board game developed and published by Electronic Arts for the iPhone and iPad platforms.GameplayMonopoly Millionaire takes the traditional Monopoly game and adds some twists and gameplay changes. In this version of Monopoly the goal is to be the first player to obtain one million dollars.Monopoly Millionaire also adds two types of power up cards called lucky and fortune cards.MultiplayerMonopoly Millionaire supports two types of multiplayer, the first is a hot seat style pass and play and the other is over wifi.
